seo.title: Jak dbać o formę podczas pobytu na Amalfi
seo.description: Treningi na schodach, biegi, pływanie — z naciskiem na bezpieczeństwo i chłodniejsze pory dnia.

linkLabel: Jak dbać o formę podczas pobytu na Amalfi
intro: Keep active on the Amalfi Coast without a gym membership: use the stairs, beaches, and hostel-friendly routines.

sections.title: Turn stairs into workouts
body: Power-walk the 500+ steps between Spiaggia Grande and Chiesa Nuova early morning to beat crowds and heat.

sections.title: Outdoor training spots
body: Jog the coastal road between Positano and Praiano at sunrise; wear high-visibility gear and stay on the inside shoulder.

sections.title: Recovery & fuel
body: Stretch calves and hips nightly; steep stairs can tighten muscles quickly without cooldowns.
